original_text: And with him they crucify two thieves; the one on his right hand, and the other on his left.
korean_text: 강도 둘을 예수와 함께 십자가에 못 박으니 하나는 그의 우편에, 하나는 좌편에 있더라

sentences.original_text: And with him they crucify two thieves
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 두 강도를 십자가에 못 박았으며

sentences.original_text: the one on his right hand
and the other on his left
